data.name: Alter Center Mass

mechanic.data: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Constitution saving throws as you generate minor mass effect fields that alter their center mass. Whenever a target that fails this saving throw makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.
At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

data.adv_option_1: Disorient : Creatures that fail the saving throw become disoriented. Until the end of your next turn, attacks made against the creature have advantage and it can't make reactions.
data.adv_option_2: Debilitate : Creatures that fail the saving throw have their movement speed reduced by half and become so dizzy they fall {prone}.
adv_options: Disorient : Creatures that fail the saving throw become disoriented. Until the end of your next turn, attacks made against the creature have advantage and it can't make reactions.
Debilitate : Creatures that fail the saving throw have their movement speed reduced by half and become so dizzy they fall {prone}.

data.name: Annihilation Field

mechanic.data: Spin a field of dark energy originating from you in a 6m sphere. The field moves with you and reduces your movement speed by half.

Each creature within the sphere must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 12d6 necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature must also make the saving throw when it enters the field's space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.
Any creature within the sphere is {primed-necrotic}. This condition ends immediately if the creature leaves the sphere.
At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, increase the radius by 2m for each slot level above the 4th.

data.adv_option_1: Anti-Armor : Each creature that fails the saving throw takes a -1 penalty to their AC.
data.adv_option_2: Phasic : Annihilation Field's damage bypasses shields.
adv_options: Anti-Armor : Each creature that fails the saving throw takes a -1 penalty to their AC.
Phasic : Annihilation Field's damage bypasses shields.

data.name: Backlash

mechanic.data: Generate a frontal biotic aegis barrier with 15 hit points. If a creature you can see hits you with an attack while the aegis is active, split the damage equally between yourself and the aegis. If the attack is a ranged weapon attack, the portion of the damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to the attacking creature instead.
If the damage is an odd number, you may choose where the extra 1 damage is dealt.
If damage dealt to the aegis is greater than its remaining hit points, deal the remaining damage to yourself.
When the aegis drops to 0 hit points the spell ends.
At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the aegis's hit points increase by 10 for each slot level above the 2nd.

data.adv_option_1: Durable : Increase the aegis's hit points to 30. Each additional spell slot about the 2nd, increases the aegis's hit points by 15.
data.adv_option_2: Counter strike : If you cast Backlash as a reaction against a melee attack and the attack misses, gain an attack of opportunity against the attacking creature.
adv_options: Durable : Increase the aegis's hit points to 30. Each additional spell slot about the 2nd, increases the aegis's hit points by 15.
Counter strike : If you cast Backlash as a reaction against a melee attack and the attack misses, gain an attack of opportunity against the attacking creature.

data.name: Ballistic Blades

mechanic.data: As an Attack action, fire a salvo of blades at a target creature or object you can see within range. Make a ranged weapon attack, you add your proficiency bonus to this roll. On a hit, the target takes 2d12 piercing damage.
You must spend a short or long rest reloading the armguard before you can this ability again.
This feature's damage increases by 2d12 when you reach 5th level (4d12), 11th level (6d12), 17th level (8d12)
Infiltrators may learn or advance this feature instead of gaining a tech power.

data.adv_option_1: Bleeding Blades : On a hit, the target takes an additional 3[dd] piercing damage at the start of their turn. This damage bypasses shields.
data.adv_option_2: Exploding blades : On a hit, the target takes an additional 3[dd] thunder damage and must pass a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus) or becomes {stunned} until the end of your next turn.
adv_options: Bleeding Blades : On a hit, the target takes an additional 3d12 piercing damage at the start of their turn. This damage bypasses shields.

Exploding blades : On a hit, the target takes and additional 3d12 thunder damage and must pass a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus) or becomes {stunned} until the end of your next turn.

data.name: Barrier

mechanic.data: Surround yourself in a high-gravity mass effect field that strengthens your defense but reduces your movement speed. While you have any barrier ticks, your speed is reduced by 4m. Whenever you take damage, remove 1 barrier tick and reduce that damage by 1d8. When you cast Barrier, refill your barrier ticks to their maximum amount. Your class indicates the maximum number of barrier ticks you can have.
This reduction increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

data.adv_option_1: Tactical Barrier : When you take damage, you may choose to expend a Barrier Tick instead of being required to use one.
data.adv_option_2: Quick Barrier : You may cast Barrier as a bonus action.
adv_options: Tactical Barrier : When you take damage, you may choose to expend a Barrier Tick instead of being required to use one.
Quick Barrier : You may cast Barrier as a bonus action.

data.name: Barrier Detonation

mechanic.data: Expend all of your remaining barrier ticks to create a negative mass effect field in a 2m sphere originating from you. In addition, roll Xd8, where X is the number of barrier ticks consumed. The result is the number of hit points of creatures this spell can affect. Starting with the creature that has the lowest current hit points, each creature affected by this spell becomes {lifted} until the start of your next turn. Subtract each creature's hit points from the total before moving on to the creature with the next lowest hit points. A creature's hit points must be equal to or less than the remaining total for that creature to be affected.
Other powers and class features can increase the die type of this roll.
Increase the number of die roll by 2d8 reach 5th level (X + 2d8), 11th level (X + 4d8), and 17th level (X + 6d8).

data.adv_option_1: Improved Lift : Add an additional 2[dd] to the roll.
data.adv_option_2: Radius : Increase the size of the detonation to 4m
adv_options: Improved Lift : Add an additional 2[dd] to the roll.
Radius : Increase the size of the detonation to 4m

data.name: Beehive

mechanic.data: As an Attack action, you equip and fire your antipersonnel cannon, colloquially called "the beehive". It ejects superheated shrapnel in a 6m cone, originating from you. Each creature caught in the blast must make Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d6 piercing damage or half as much damage on a successful one.
The DC is (8 + proficiency bonus + DEX modifier).
You must spend a short or long rest reconfiguring the cannon to use it again.
This feature's damage increases by 2d6 when you reach 5th level (4d6), 11th level (6d6), 17th level (8d6)
Infiltrators may learn or advance this feature instead of gaining a tech power.

data.adv_option_1: Anti-Flesh : The Beehive deals double damage to unprotected, organic targets.
data.adv_option_2: Remote Deploy : As an action, you can set up your Beehive in a separate location. Once it is deployed you can use an Attack action to fire it.
adv_options: Anti-Flesh : The Beehive deals double damage to unprotected, organic targets.
Remote Deploy : As an action, you can set up your Beehive in a separate location. Once it is deployed you can use an Attack action to fire it.

data.name: Biotic Orbs

mechanic.data: Summon 3 biotic orbs that float around you. If you have at least 3 orbs, you gain one additional max level (highest available level) spell slot. You may also expend an orb and make a ranged spell attack on a creature within 20m. On a hot, deal force damage equal to 2d10 + your biotic modifier. The orbs last 1 hour or until you've expended all of them.
At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of level 3 or higher, the number of orbs increases by 1 for each slot level above the 2nd.

data.adv_option_1: Improved Orbs : Gain 2 max level spell slots when at least 3 orbs are active
data.adv_option_2: Defense Orbs : As a reaction, you can expend an orb to create a micro barrier on the incoming attack, reducing the damage by 1d8. You can use this power on yourself or other creatures.
adv_options: Improved Orbs : Gain 2 max level spell slots when at least 3 orbs are active
Defense Orbs : As a reaction, you can expend an orb to create a micro barrier on the incoming attack, reducing the damage by 1d8. You can use this power on yourself or other creatures.

data.name: Biotic Sphere

mechanic.data: Channel a sphere with (5d12 + your level) hit points that extends out from you in a 6m radius and moves with you. Hostile creatures cannot enter or leave the sphere.
Hostile attacks made on friendly targets are absorbed by the sphere (the sphere automatically fails any saving throws).
Friendly attacks on hostile creatures within the sphere have advantage.
The sphere dissipates when it's hit points are gone. If an attack would deal more damage than the remaining hit points of the sphere, the sphere soaks all of the damage and then dissipates.
At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of level 4 or higher, the sphere's health increases by 1d12 for each slot level above the 3rd.

data.adv_option_1: Infuse Ammo : Friendly creatures inside the sphere add 1d4 force damage to all ranged weapon attacks on creatures outside of the sphere and subtract that much from the sphere's HP. This damage can detonate abilities.
data.adv_option_2: Armored : The sphere has resistance to piercing, slashing, and bludgeoning damage.
adv_options: Infuse Ammo : Friendly creatures inside the sphere add 1d4 force damage to all ranged weapon attacks on creatures outside of the sphere and subtract that much from the sphere's HP. This damage can detonate abilities.
Armored : The sphere has resistance to piercing, slashing, and bludgeoning damage.

data.name: Biotic Wall

mechanic.data: With an immense positive charge, create an invisible mass effect field that acts like a wall at a point you choose within range. The wall appears in any orientation you choose, as a horizontal or vertical barrier or at an angle. It can be free floating or resting on a solid surface. You can form it into a hemispherical dome or a sphere with a radius of up to 4m, or you can shape a flat surface made up of ten 2m by 2m panels. Each panel must be contiguous with another panel. In any form, the wall is 1/4 inch thick. It lasts for the duration. If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (your choice which side).
Nothing can physically pass through the wall. It is immune to all damage.

data.adv_option_1: Lifting Wall : If a creature comes within 2m of the wall, you can use your reaction to make a pocket of negatively charged space near the creature's location. It must pass a Dexterity saving throw or become {lifted} until the end of your next turn.
data.adv_option_2: Shifting Wall : As a reaction, you can either move the wall up to 6m in any direction, rotate the wall up to 180 degrees, or reshape the wall within the parameters listed above.
adv_options: Lifting Wall : If a creature comes within 2m of the wall, you can use your reaction to make a pocket of negatively charged space near the creature's location. It must pass a Dexterity saving throw or become {lifted} until the end of your next turn.
Shifting Wall : As a reaction, you can either move the wall up to 6m in any direction, rotate the wall up to 180 degrees, or reshape the wall within the parameters listed above.

data.name: Catapult

mechanic.data: Choose one object weighing less than 10 kilos (about 20 lbs.) within range that isn't being worn or carried. The object flies in a straight line up to 30m in a direction you choose before falling to the ground, stopping early if it impacts against a solid surface. If the object would strike a creature, that creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the object strikes the target and stops moving. In either case, both the object and the creature or solid surface take 3d10 bludgeoning damage.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the maximum weight of objects that you can target with this spell increases by 2 kilos (5lbs), and the damage increases by 1d10, for each slot level above 1st.

data.adv_option_1: Salvo : You can choose any number of objects as long as the total weight of all objects chosen does not exceed the maximum amount of weight for the spell. Each object can be sent in a different direction, but only deals 1[dd] damage.
data.adv_option_2: Delayed Catapult : When you cast this spell, you may delay the launch of the object. It hovers 2m off the ground until you launch it. You may use a reaction or bonus action to launch the object. If launched as a reaction towards a target making an attack roll, you imposed disadvantage on that roll.
adv_options: Salvo : You can choose any number of objects as long as the total weight of all objects chosen does not exceed the maximum amount of weight for the spell. Each object can be sent in a different direction, but only deals 1d10 damage.

Delayed Catapult : When you cast this spell, you may delay the launch of the object. It hovers 2m off the ground until you launch it. You may use a reaction or bonus action to launch the object. If launched as a reaction towards a target making an attack roll, you imposed disadvantage on that roll.

data.name: Charge

mechanic.data: Alter your mass and choose a creature or object you can see within range. Use the target's mass to pull yourself to its location with incredible force. Any creature or object within a 2m sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 1d6 force damage and becomes {prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.
The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach the 5th level (2d6), 11th level(3d6) and 17th level(4d6).

data.adv_option_1: Necrotic Strike: The damage of your charge become necrotic. You no longer create a burst in a 2m radius when you hit the target. Instead, all enemies in the line between you and the target, including the target, must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 2d10 necrotic damage.
data.adv_option_2: Distance : The force ripples outwards from the point of impact, increasing the radius to 4m.
adv_options: Necrotic Strike: The damage of your charge become necrotic. You no longer create a burst in a 2m radius when you hit the target. Instead, all enemies in the line between you and the target, including the target, must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 2d10 necrotic damage.
Distance : The force ripples outwards from the point of impact, increasing the radius to 4m.

data.name: Concussive Shot

mechanic.data: As a bonus action, load a specialized thermal clip into the weapon you are currently wielding. Until you reload, any successful ranged attacks deal an additional 1d8 bludgeoning damage and medium-sized or smaller creatures must pass a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + DEX modifier) or are knocked {prone}.
You have 3 charges of Concussive Shot. You regain all of your charges on a long rest.

data.adv_option_1: Stunning Shot : A creature hit by Concussive Shot must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + DEX modifier). On a failed save, the creature is {stunned} until the end of your next turn.
data.adv_option_2: Improved shot : Increase the bonus damage of Concussive shot to d12.
adv_options: Stunning Shot : A creature hit by Concussive Shot must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + DEX modifier). On a failed save, the creature is {stunned} until the end of your next turn.
Improved shot : Increase the bonus damage of Concussive shot to d12.

data.name: Counterspell

mechanic.data: Spend 5 tech points to attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a biotic spell. Make an ability check using your tech ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level (0 for cantrips). On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.
Each additional tech point spent reduces the DC by 1.

data.adv_option_1: Lockdown : If you succeed on your ability check, you overload the target's biotic implant and it cannot cast biotic spells until the end of its next turn.
data.adv_option_2: Psychic Strain : If succeed on the ability check, the target takes Xd6 psychic damage, where X is the level of the spell. Targets take 1d4 psychic damage for cantrips.
adv_options: Lockdown : If you succeed on your ability check, you overload the target's biotic implant and it cannot cast biotic spells until the end of its next turn.
Psychic Strain : If succeed on the ability check, the target takes Xd6 psychic damage, where X is the level of the spell. Targets take 1d4 psychic damage for cantrips.

data.name: Cryo Beam

mechanic.data: You spend tech points to blast a stream of liquid hydrogen from your omni-tool. Each creature in a 6m cube becomes {primed-cold} until the end of its next turn and must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes Xd8 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one where X is the number of tech points spent. If the target is unprotected, it must pass a Strength saving throw or becomes {frozen} until the end of its next turn.

data.adv_option_1: Brittle Freeze : Creatures that fail the Constitution saving throw suffer a -1 AC penalty
data.adv_option_2: Frozen Ground : Cryo beam leaves a patch of ice on the ground that lasts for 1 min. Each creature that moves into or out of the patch must pass a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, slips and falls [Prone], ending its movement.
adv_options: Brittle Freeze : Creatures that fail the Constitution saving throw suffer a -1 AC penalty

Frozen Ground : Cryo beam leaves a patch of ice on the ground that lasts for 1 min. Each creature that moves into or out of the patch must pass a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, slips and falls [Prone], ending its movement.

data.name: Cryo Blast

mechanic.data: You spend tech points to fire a mass of super cooled, subatomic particles at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target becomes {primed-cold} until the end of its next turn and takes Xd8 cold damage, where X is the number of tech points spent, and the target's movement is reduced by half. If the target is unprotected, it must pass a Strength saving throw or becomes {frozen} until the end of its next turn.

data.adv_option_1: Ice Lance : Transform the attack into a deadly lance. The attack can no longer freeze or slow the target, but you add 1d6 piercing damage for each tech point spent.
data.adv_option_2: Frigid Air : The blast snap freezes the air around the target in a 2m radius. Each creature that enters the frozen space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there must pass a Constitution saving throw or take 2d4 cold damage.
adv_options: Ice Lance : Transform the attack into a deadly lance. The attack can no longer freeze or slow the target, but you add 1d6 piercing damage for each tech point spent.

Frigid Air : The blast snap freezes the air around the target in a 2m radius. Each creature that enters the frozen space for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there must pass a Constitution saving throw or take 2d4 cold damage.

data.name: Dark Channel

mechanic.data: Make a ranged spell attack on a creature you can see within range. On a hit, you plague the target with a persistent, damaging biotic field. The creature is {primed-necrotic} and takes 1d10 necrotic damage and 1d10 necrotic damage at the start of your turn while you maintain the spell. If the creature dies, Dark Channel transfers to another random, hostile creature within 10m. Only one Dark Channel can may be active at a time.
The damage increases by 1d10 when you reach the 5th level (2d10), 11th level(3d10) and 17th level(4d10).

data.adv_option_1: Cripple : If the affected creature would make a saving throw or attack roll, as a reaction you may increase the severity of Dark Channel. The affected creature must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d12
adv_options: Cripple : If the affected creature would make a saving throw or attack roll, as a reaction you may increase the severity of Dark Channel. The affected creature must roll a d4 and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.
Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d12

data.name: Dark Sphere

mechanic.data: Launch a slow-moving, 4m wide sphere of dark energy in a straight line in front of you. It moves 4m this turn and at the start of each subsequent turn. Each creature caught in the path becomes {primed-necrotic} until the end of its next turn and must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes necrotic damage equal to 6d8 + your biotic modifier, or half as much on a successful one. When the sphere reaches 20m, it detonates and each creature within 10m becomes {primed-necrotic} for 1 minute and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes necrotic damage equal to 6d8 + your biotic modifier necrotic damage or half as much damage on a successful one.
You can use an action to detonate the sphere early.
If you lose concentration while casting the spell, it does not detonate.
At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of level 3 or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above the 2nd.

data.adv_option_1: Control : At the start of your turn, before the sphere moves, you can change its direction.
data.adv_option_2: Amplify : Every 4m, the sphere's potential damage increases. Add 1[dd] to the detonation damage for each 4m the sphere travels.
adv_options: Control : At the start of your turn, before the sphere moves, you can change its direction.
Amplify : Every 4m, the sphere's potential damage increases. Add 1d8 to the detonation damage for each 4m the sphere travels.

data.name: Decoy

mechanic.data: Spend X tech points to summon a holographic copy of yourself at a location within 10m. The copy mimics your actions. When a creature attacks, it can make a Wisdom (Perception) check and, if it succeeds, is not fooled. The DC of the check is 8 + your Tech modifier + X.

data.adv_option_1: Explosive : As an action, you can spend X tech points detonate your Decoy. Each creature within 4m must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes Xd6 fire damage or half as much on a successful one.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Decoy : Your Decoy becomes so life-like that creatures have disadvantage on the Intelligence (Perception) check.
adv_options: Explosive : As an action, you can spend X tech points detonate your Decoy. Each creature within 4m must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes Xd6 fire damage or half as much on a successful one.
Improved Decoy : Your Decoy becomes so life-like that creatures have disadvantage on the Intelligence (Perception) check.

data.name: Defense Matrix

mechanic.data: Spend X tech points to reinforce your armor with special Foucault currents. You gain resistance to your choice of X damage types.

data.adv_option_1: Shield : Deploy the matrix as a stationary shield. Up to 2 creatures of medium size can stand behind the shield, gaining the resistance benefit when attacked by creatures from the other side of the shield.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Defense : Gain a +2 bonus to your AC while Defense Matrix is active.
adv_options: Shield : Deploy the matrix as a stationary shield. Up to 2 creatures of medium size can stand behind the shield, gaining the resistance benefit when attacked by creatures from the other side of the shield.
Improved Defense : Gain a +2 bonus to your AC while Defense Matrix is active.

data.name: Dominate

mechanic.data: Target an organic creature within 20m. It must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or it becomes Dominated (it is considered {charmed} and can't use spells or abilities).

On its turn, the dominated creature attacks the closest creature hostile to the spell caster, making a ranged weapon attack or melee attack if it does not have a weapon. If there are no hostile creatures within range, the dominated creature uses its turn to run towards the closest hostile creature.
Each time the dominated creature takes damage, it makes a new Wisdom saving throw against the spell. If the saving throw succeeds, the spell ends.

data.adv_option_1: Total Control : You take the dominated creatures action. You may use its spells and abilities.
data.adv_option_2: Damage : While the creature is dominated, it takes 2d6 psychic damage at the end of its turn. This damage does not proc an opportunity to end Dominate.
adv_options: Total Control : You take the dominated creatures action. You may use its spells and abilities.
Damage : While the creature is dominated, it takes 2d6 psychic damage at the end of its turn. This damage does not proc an opportunity to end Dominate.

data.name: Electric Slash

mechanic.data: Spend X tech points to unleash a wave of electric energy in an 8m cone originating from you. Each creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes Xd8 lightning damage or half as much damage on a successful one.

data.adv_option_1: Shield Restore : If you are wearing armor, gain shield points equal to half of your damage roll.
data.adv_option_2: Paralyze : Creatures that fail the saving throw are paralyzed until the end of their next turn.
adv_options: Shield Restore : If you are wearing armor, gain shield points equal to half of your damage roll.
Paralyze : Creatures that fail the saving throw are paralyzed until the end of their next turn.

data.name: Energy Drain

mechanic.data: You spend tech points to cycle your Omni-tool, sapping electromagnetic energy from a creature you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes Xd4 lightning damage, where X is the amount of tech points you spent. Additionally, if you are wearing armor, gain shield points equal to half of the damage done.

data.adv_option_1: Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d6.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Regen : If you are wearing armor, gain shield points equal to your damage roll.
adv_options: Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d6.
Improved Regen : If you are wearing armor, gain shield points equal to your damage roll.

data.name: First Aid

mechanic.data: Spend X tech points to inject a friendly creature with nanobots that reduce pain and heal internal injuries. The creature gains hit points equal to Xd8 + your Tech modifier

data.adv_option_1: Adaptive : The healed creature gains resistance to the last damage type it suffered. This effect lasts for 1 minute.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Healing : Increase the healing die type to d12
adv_options: Adaptive : The healed creature gains resistance to the last damage type it suffered. This effect lasts for 1 minute.
Improved Healing : Increase the healing die type to d12

data.name: Flamethrower

mechanic.data: You spend tech points to overload your omni-tool's acetylene torch, spewing flames in front of you. Each creature within an 8m cone is {primed-fire} until the end of its next turn and must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes Xd10 fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one where X is the number of tech points spent.

data.adv_option_1: Concentrated Burn : Increase the damage to d12 and the distance to 12m, but the area-of-effect is now a line instead of a cone.
data.adv_option_2: Exhaust : The flames leave behind a thick smoke for 1 turn. Creatures have disadvantage while making ranged weapon attacks against you until the start of your next turn.
adv_options: Concentrated Burn : Increase the damage to d12 and the distance to 12m, but the area-of-effect is now a line instead of a cone.
Exhaust : The flames leave behind a thick smoke for 1 turn. Creatures have disadvantage while making ranged weapon attacks against you until the start of your next turn.

data.name: Flare

mechanic.data: Rapidly altering the mass of air particles creates radioactive projectiles that seek out the targets and explode. Choose up to 4 creatures that you can see within range. Each creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is blinded until the end of your next turn and takes radiant damage equal to 6d12. On a successful save, a creature takes half damage, but suffers no other negative effect.
At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, increase the damage by 1d12 for each spell slot above the 4th.

data.adv_option_1: Improved Blind : Each creature is blinded no matter the result of its saving throw.
data.adv_option_2: Heat seeking flare : Instead of choosing 4 targets, you may instead choose 1. If you do so, the target has disadvantage on the saving throw. Increase the damage by 4[dd].
adv_options: Improved Blind : Each creature is blinded no matter the result of its saving throw.
Heat seeking flare : Instead of choosing 4 targets, you may instead choose 1. If you do so, the target has disadvantage on the saving throw. Increase the damage by 4d12.

data.name: Fly

mechanic.data: Create a negative mass effect field around a willing, Medium sized or smaller creature and lift it 2m into the air. The creature's speed becomes zero, but you can use a bonus action or reaction to move the creature up to 20m through the air. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft, unless it can stop the fall.
At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

data.adv_option_1: Improved Lift : You can lift Large sized creatures
data.adv_option_2: Quick : You can cast Fly as a bonus action
adv_options: Improved Lift : You can lift Large sized creatures
Quick : You can cast Fly as a bonus action

data.name: Fortification

mechanic.data: As a reaction, reinforce your armor using protective Foucault currents. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack.
You must finish a short or long rest before you can use this ability again.

data.adv_option_1: Lasting Fortification : Fortification lasts an additional turn.
data.adv_option_2: Venting Fortification : When fortification ends, the currents are sent to your gauntlets. Your next Omni-tool attack is made at advantage and deals an additional 2d10 bludgeoning damage.
adv_options: Lasting Fortification : Fortification lasts an additional turn.
Venting Fortification : When fortification ends, the currents are sent to your gauntlets. Your next Omni-tool attack is made at advantage and deals an additional 2d10 bludgeoning damage.

data.name: Guidance

mechanic.data: Spend 1 tech point to tap into the VI of a willing creature. The target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check or saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the roll.

data.adv_option_1: Multi Tap : You can tap into two willing creatures' VI when you use this power.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Tap : Increase the die type to d6
adv_options: Multi Tap : You can tap into two willing creatures' VI when you use this power.
Improved Tap : Increase the die type to d6

data.name: Havoc Strike

mechanic.data: As an Attack action, use a propulsion jet built into your leg armor to spring to a location within 8m and strike the ground with violent force. Each creature within a 2m radius of where you land must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + STR modifier). On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage or half as much on a successful one.
You must finish a short or long rest before you can use Havoc Strike again.
This feature's damage increases by 2d8 when you reach 5th level (4d8), 11th level (6d8), 17th level (8d8)

data.adv_option_1: Improved Distance : You can jump up to 12m.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Radius : Increase the radius of the impact to 4m
adv_options: Improved Distance : You can jump up to 12m.
Improved Radius : Increase the radius of the impact to 4m

data.name: Hawk Missile Launcher

mechanic.data: As an Attack action, activate your personal shoulder cannon: The Hawk Missile Launcher. This attack automatically hits a target within range dealing 3d6 thunder damage.
The Hawk Missile Launcher has 2 charges. You regain all charges on a long rest.
This feature's damage increases by 3d6 when you reach 5th level (6d6), 11th level (9d6), 17th level (12d6)

data.adv_option_1: Anti-Shield : The missile detonates a small EMP, transforming the damage to lightning.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Damage : Increase the damage to 5[dd]
adv_options: Anti-Shield : The missile detonates a small EMP, transforming the damage to lightning.
Improved Damage : Increase the damage to 5d6

data.name: Hex Shield

mechanic.data: As a bonus action, you toss a portable shield generator onto the ground in front of you. It generates 2m tall and wide, hexagon-shaped shield with 5AC and 50 shield points.
As long as the Hex Shield has shield points, it provides full cover to creatures behind it.
Hex shield regains all shield points on a long rest.

data.adv_option_1: Hearty Shield : Increase the shield's hit points to 100.
data.adv_option_2: Large Shield : The Shield covers a 4m wide area.
adv_options: Hearty Shield : Increase the shield's hit points to 100.
Large Shield : The Shield covers a 4m wide area.

data.name: Incinerate

mechanic.data: You spend tech points to hurl a high-explosive, plasma round at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target is {primed-fire} and takes Xd10 fire damage, where X is the number of tech points you spent. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

data.adv_option_1: Frozen Combo : Deal double damage to frozen targets.
data.adv_option_2: Radial Blast : On a miss, the target creature takes half the damage.
adv_options: Frozen Combo : Deal double damage to frozen targets.
Radial Blast : On a miss, the target creature takes half the damage.

data.name: Invasion

mechanic.data: Spend 3 tech points per creature size and choose a synthetic within 20m (e.g. 3 tech points for small, 6 tech points for medium, 9 tech points for large). The synthetic must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or becomes hacked (considered {charmed}). A hacked synthetic won't attack friendly creatures and can't use spells or abilities.

On its turn, the hacked synthetic attacks the closest hostile creature, making ranged weapon attack or melee attack if it does not have a weapon. If it doesn't have a weapon and there are no hostile creatures within melee range, the hacked synthetic uses its turn to dash towards the closest hostile creature.
Each time the synthetic takes damage, it makes a new Intelligence saving throw against the spell. If the saving throw succeeds, the spell ends.

data.adv_option_1: Total Control : You take the hacked synthetic's action. You may use its spells and abilities.
data.adv_option_2: Damage : While the synthetic is hacked, it takes 2d6 shock damage at the end of its turn. This damage does not proc an opportunity to end Invasion.
adv_options: Total Control : You take the hacked synthetic's action. You may use its spells and abilities.
Damage : While the synthetic is hacked, it takes 2d6 shock damage at the end of its turn. This damage does not proc an opportunity to end Invasion.

data.name: Lance

mechanic.data: Make a ranged spell attack on a creature you can see within range. On a hit, release a lance of energy that deals force damage equal to 3d8 + your biotic modifier.
At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of level 2 or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above the 1st.

data.adv_option_1: Anti-Shield : Damage type become lightning.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d12.
adv_options: Anti-Shield : Damage type become lightning.
Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d12.

data.name: Lash

mechanic.data: Consume barrier ticks to create a whip of biotic energy. Each barrier tick consumed increases the range of the whip by 2m. Target a creature you can see within the resulting range. The target takes 4d8 force damage and becomes {grappled} and {primed-force} until it escapes the grapple. A detonating attack immediately ends the grapple or, to escape the grapple, the creature must succeed on a contested Strength (Athletics) against your Constitution.
At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of level 3 or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above the 2nd.

data.adv_option_1: Improved Grapple : The grappled creature has disadvantage when trying to escape.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d12.
adv_options: Improved Grapple : The grappled creature has disadvantage when trying to escape.
Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d12.

data.name: Lift

mechanic.data: This spell creates a negative mass effect field around a target creature. Roll 5d8. If the total roll is greater than or equal to the hit points of the targeted creature, it becomes {lifted}.
At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of level 2 or higher, add 2d8 to the roll for each level above the first.

data.adv_option_1: Heavy Lift : Increase the die type for Lift to d12.
data.adv_option_2: Control : While the target is lifted, you can use your action to move the target up to 10m.
adv_options: Heavy Lift : Increase the die type for Lift to d12.
Control : While the target is lifted, you can use your action to move the target up to 10m.

data.name: Neural Shock

mechanic.data: You spend tech points to flash an ion laser at an organic creature within range. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. The DC of this throw is increased by 1 for each tech point spent. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage on the next melee or ranged attack it makes and can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

data.adv_option_1: Damage: A creature takes X[dd] psychic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one where X is the number of tech points spent.
data.adv_option_2: Paralyze : If a creature fails the saving throw, it is paralyzed for 1 turn.
adv_options: Damage: A creature takes Xd6 psychic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one where X is the number of tech points spent.
Paralyze : If a creature fails the saving throw, it is paralyzed for 1 turn.

data.name: Nightshade Blade

mechanic.data: Your Omni-tool is equipped with a microscopic, poison-tipped blade that is able to piece through shields and armor. As an Attack action, make a ranged weapon attack on a creature you can see within range, you add your proficiency bonus to this roll. On a hit, the target takes 1d12 poison damage and must make on a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus)). On a failed save, the target takes 2d12 poison damage, or half as much damage on a successful one. If a target would be reduced to 0 hit points by this damage, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead and is {poisoned}. All damage caused by Nightshade Blade bypasses shields.
You must be within melee range and use an action to recover the blade.
This feature's secondary damage effect increases by 3d12 when you reach 5th level (5d12), 11th level (8d12), 17th level (11d12)
Infiltrators may learn or advance this feature instead of gaining a tech power.

data.adv_option_1: Paralyze : A creature that fails the Constitution saving throw becomes {paralyzed} until the end of your next turn.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Poison : The creature has disadvantage on its Constitution saving throw.
adv_options: Paralyze : A creature that fails the Constitution saving throw becomes {paralyzed} until the end of your next turn.
Improved Poison : The creature has disadvantage on its Constitution saving throw.

data.name: Nova

mechanic.data: Transfer the energy of your barrier into a biotic explosion, consuming your remaining barrier ticks. Creatures within a 2m sphere centered on you must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is knocked {prone} and takes force damage equal to Xd10, where X is the number of barrier ticks. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the explosion increases by 2m for each level above the 1st.

data.adv_option_1: Improved Damage : Increase the damage die to d10.
data.adv_option_2: Half Blast : You can cast Nova, you cause up to 2 blasts. Each blast consumes one half of your barrier ticks. If you have an odd number of barrier ticks, you choose which blast consumes the remaining tick. If you have not used all your movement, you can move in between the blasts.
adv_options: Improved Damage : Increase the damage die to d10.

Half Blast : You can cast Nova, you cause up to 2 blasts. Each blast consumes one half of your barrier ticks. If you have an odd number of barrier ticks, you choose which blast consumes the remaining tick. If you have not used all your movement, you can move in between the blasts.

data.name: Overload

mechanic.data: You spend tech points to unleash an electrostatic discharge at a creature or object within range. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets, each of which must be within 6m of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts.

A target become {primed-lightning} until the end of its next turn and must make a Dexterity saving throw. The target takes Xd4 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one where X is the number of tech points you spent.

data.adv_option_1: Extended Leap : Overload can leap to targets within 10m.
data.adv_option_2: Quad Leap : Overload can leap to five additional targets, but deals 1d4 damage.
adv_options: Extended Leap : Overload can leap to targets within 10m.
Quad Leap : Overload can leap to five additional targets, but deals 1d4 damage.

data.name: Phase Disruptor

mechanic.data: You focus the energy of your barrier into a high-powered beam at a target creature or object within range. Remove 1 barrier tick and make a ranged spell attack on that target. On a hit, the creature takes 3d4 force damage.

A higher levels, you may use additional barrier ticks to create more than one beam: two beams at 5th level, three beams at 11th level, and four beams at 17th level. You can direct the beams at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each beam.

data.adv_option_1: Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d6.
data.adv_option_2: Cripple : Creature's hit by Phase Disruptor have disadvantage on their next attack roll.
adv_options: Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d6.
Cripple : Creature's hit by Phase Disruptor have disadvantage on their next attack roll.

data.name: Poison Spray

mechanic.data: Spend 1 tech point to shoot an aerosol spray of noxious chemicals from your omni-tool at a creature within melee range. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage and becomes poisoned until the end of your next turn. The DC of the saving throw is increase by 1 for each additional tech point you spend.

data.adv_option_1: Pepper spray : Creatures that fail the Constitution saving throw are also blinded for 1 minute.
data.adv_option_2: Poison Cloud : Create a 2m-radius cloud of poison that persists for 1 minute. Each creature that enters the sphere for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there must make the Constitution saving throw.
adv_options: Pepper spray : Creatures that fail the Constitution saving throw are also blinded for 1 minute.

Poison Cloud : Create a 2m-radius cloud of poison that persists for 1 minute. Each creature that enters the sphere for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there must make the Constitution saving throw.

data.name: Pull

mechanic.data: You create a negative mass effect field around a creature or object you can see within range then jerk the field sharply towards you, bringing the target with it. Only Medium and smaller creatures are affected. The distance the target travels is based on its size, starting at 2m for medium-sized objects and adding 4m for each size small than medium. E.g., Medium = 2m, Small = 6m, Tiny = 10m, etc.

If attempting to pull an object from another creature, the creature must pass a Strength saving throw to retain possession of the object. If you pull a creature and it moves more than 2m, it must pass a Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {prone}.
The number of targets increase by 1 when you reach the 5th level (2), 11th level (3), and 17th level (4).

data.adv_option_1: Magician: You can shape and guide pull to add different trajectories to the object. The direction of pull cannot change, but you can add arcs, decrease the distance the object moves, and even pull small objects directly into your hand.
data.adv_option_2: Push: You may choose to move the target towards or away from you.
adv_options: Magician: You can shape and guide pull to add different trajectories to the object. The direction of pull cannot change, but you can add arcs, decrease the distance the object moves, and even pull small objects directly into your hand.
Push: You may choose to move the target towards or away from you.

data.name: Reave

mechanic.data: Unleash a wave of dark biotic energy in a 6m cube. Each creature within the blast becomes {primed-necrotic} until the end of its next turn and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d10 necrotic damage and has disadvantage on their next attack or saving thrown. A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.
At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, increase the damage by 1d10 for each level above the second.

data.adv_option_1: Distance : Increase the range of Reave to 10m.
data.adv_option_2: Armor boost : The dark energy heightens your senses momentarily. When you cast Reave, gain +2AC until the start of your next turn.
adv_options: Distance : Increase the range of Reave to 10m.
Armor boost : The dark energy heightens your senses momentarily. When you cast Reave, gain +2AC until the start of your next turn.

data.name: Sabotage

mechanic.data: Spend 1 tech points and make a ranged tech attack on a weapon you can see within 20m (DC 10). On a hit, the next creature to use that weapon to make a ranged attack has disadvantage on the attack roll.

data.adv_option_1: Multi-Weapon : You can target 3 weapons at once.
data.adv_option_2: Disable : After the weapon fires, it becomes jammed. It cannot be fired again until it is reloaded.
adv_options: Multi-Weapon : You can target 3 weapons at once.
Disable : After the weapon fires, it becomes jammed. It cannot be fired again until it is reloaded.

data.name: Salvo

mechanic.data: You spend tech points to create glowing darts of plasma equal to the number of tech points spent. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4+1 fire damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

data.adv_option_1: Exploding Salvo : Each dart deals an additional 1d4 thunder damage.
data.adv_option_2: Blinding Salvo : The darts explode in a bright flash of light. Targets no longer take damage but must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
adv_options: Exploding Salvo : Each dart deals an additional 1d4 thunder damage.

Blinding Salvo : The darts explode in a bright flash of light. Targets no longer take damage but must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

data.name: Sentry Turret

mechanic.data: Spend 5 tech points to set up a sentry turret within melee range. The turret has HP equal to 5d8+your level. At the end of your turn, the turret attacks. It continues to attack at the end of your turn until it is destroyed.
The turret has 2 possible attacks. You may select which attack the turret makes.

Shoot flames in a 6m cone in a direction of your choosing. Each creature within the cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 fire damage or half as much damage on a successful one.
Make a ranged weapon attack (+ your proficiency) on a target of your choice. On a success, it deals 2d8 thunder damage.

data.adv_option_1: Power Turret : Increase the damage die for the flame and ranged attack to a d12.
data.adv_option_2: Lasting Turret : Increase the die rolled for the turret's health to d12.
adv_options: Power Turret : Increase the damage die for the flame and ranged attack to a d12.
Lasting Turret : Increase the die rolled for the turret's health to d12.

data.name: Shocking Grasp

mechanic.data: Spend a tech point to send an electric shock from your omni-tool to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor. On a hit, the target becomes {primed-lightning} until the end of its next turn and takes Xd6 lightning damage where X is the number of tech points spent, and it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

data.adv_option_1: Reach : Increase the range to 4m.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Shock : Increase the damage die to d8.
adv_options: Reach : Increase the range to 4m.
Improved Shock : Increase the damage die to d8.

data.name: Shockwave

mechanic.data: Create a cascading shockwave in a 10m line originating from you. Each creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d6 force damage and is knocked {prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.
At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of level 2 or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above the 1st.

data.adv_option_1: Improved Distance : The shockwave travels 16m
data.adv_option_2: Improved Damage : Increase damage die type to d10
adv_options: Improved Distance : The shockwave travels 16m
Improved Damage : Increase damage die type to d10

data.name: Siege Pulse

mechanic.data: As an Attack action, overload your shield capacitors causing a loud, painfully intense kinetic wave to erupt from your location. Reduce your shield points by 5. Each creature within a 4m sphere becomes {deafened} and must make Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus). On a failed save, a creature is {incapacitated} until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes 2d4 psychic damage.
You may use Siege Pulse as long as you have at least 5 shield points.

data.adv_option_1: Improved Pulse : Add your STR or DEX modifier to the DC of the saving throw. You choose which one.
data.adv_option_2: Lingering Pulse : Creatures hit by siege pulse have disadvantage on melee and ranged attacks until the end of your next turn.
adv_options: Improved Pulse : Add your STR or DEX modifier to the DC of the saving throw. You choose which one.
Lingering Pulse : Creatures hit by siege pulse have disadvantage on melee and ranged attacks until the end of your next turn.

data.name: Singularity

mechanic.data: Create a negative mass effect field in a 4m sphere at a target location within range. Each hostile creature within the sphere's radius must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or becomes {lifted}. Only creatures of a medium size or less are affected. Any creature that comes within 2m of the sphere must succeed on a Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Agility) check or they are drawn into the sphere and become lifted.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, increase the size of the sphere by 2m per spell slot above the 3rd.

data.adv_option_1: Heavy Singularity: When a creature affected by this power makes a DEX or STR save to avoid its pull, they make that save at disadvantage.
data.adv_option_2: Damage : A hostile creature that enters the sphere for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there is takes 1d4 necrotic damage.
adv_options: Heavy Singularity: When a creature affected by this power makes a DEX or STR save to avoid its pull, they make that save at disadvantage.
Damage : A hostile creature that enters the sphere for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there is takes 1d4 necrotic damage.

data.name: Slam

mechanic.data: Target a {lifted} object and slam it to the ground dealing force damage equal to 2d8 + your biotic modifier. The target is no longer {lifted} but is {prone}.
The number of targets increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2), 11th level (3) and 17th level (4)

data.adv_option_1: Stun : The creature must pass a Constitution saving throw or stunned for 1 round.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d12
adv_options: Stun : The creature must pass a Constitution saving throw or stunned for 1 round.
Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d12

mechanic.data: When you or a creature within 10m of you falls, choose up to five falling creatures within range. Create a negative mass effect field around each creature, slowing the rate of descent to 20m per round. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no Falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.

data.name: Snap Freeze

mechanic.data: Spend 5 tech points to launch a globe of super cooled helium to a target location within range, where it explodes in a 10m-radius sphere. Each creature within the area becomes {primed-cold} until the end of its next turn and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature if {frozen} until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, its movement is halved until the end of your next turn. The DC of the saving throw is increase by each tech point you spend above 5.
The ground within the 10m sphere becomes icy and is considered difficult terrain.

If the globe strikes a body of water or a liquid that is principally water (not including water-based creatures), it freezes the liquid to a depth of 15 centimeters over an area 10m. This ice lasts for 1 minute. Creatures that were swimming on the surface of frozen water are trapped in the ice. A trapped creature can use an action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC to break free.

data.adv_option_1: Lasting Freeze : A creature frozen by Snap Freeze continues to take 1d6 cold damage at the start of its turn for 1 minute.
data.adv_option_2: Brittle Freeze : Successful attacks against a creature that is frozen by Snap Freeze deal an additional 1d4 cold damage.
adv_options: Lasting Freeze : A creature frozen by Snap Freeze continues to take 1d6 cold damage at the start of its turn for 1 minute.
Brittle Freeze : Successful attacks against a creature that is frozen by Snap Freeze deal an additional 1d4 cold damage.

data.name: Stasis

mechanic.data: Lock a target in a high-gravity mass effect field. Choose a creature you can see within range. The creature must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {restrained} and {primed-force} for the duration of the spell. At the beginning of the creature's turn, it can use its action to make the saving throw again. A detonating attack immediately ends the spell.

data.adv_option_1: Vulnerable : A creature in Stasis takes +2 damage from all damage rolls.
data.adv_option_2: Heavy Stasis : The creature has disadvantage on its saving throws to escape Stasis.
adv_options: Vulnerable : A creature in Stasis takes +2 damage from all damage rolls.
Heavy Stasis : The creature has disadvantage on its saving throws to escape Stasis.

data.name: Stimulant Pack

mechanic.data: As a bonus action, inject yourself with a stimulant pack. You have advantage on the next Dexterity, Strength, or Constitution saving throw. You must finish a short or long rest before you can use this feature again.
Infiltrators may learn or advance this feature instead of gaining a tech power.

data.adv_option_1: Friendly : You can inject a creature within melee range with the stimulant pack
data.adv_option_2: Improved Attack : You can choose to apply the advantage to your next damage roll
adv_options: Friendly : You can inject a creature within melee range with the stimulant pack
Improved Attack : You can choose to apply the advantage to your next damage roll

data.name: Storm

mechanic.data: An 8m-radius sphere of rapid shifting mass effect fields springs into existence centered on a point you choose within range, creating a dangerous whirlwind of debris and energy. The sphere remains for the spell’s duration. Each creature in the sphere when it appears or that ends its turn there must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take 8d10 force damage. The sphere’s space is difficult terrain.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases for each of its effects by 1d10 for each slot level above 4th.

data.adv_option_1: Necrotic Bolts: Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on each of your turns to cause a bolt of necrotic energy to leap from the center of the sphere toward one creature you choose within 20m of the center. Make a ranged spell attack. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is in the sphere. On a hit, the target takes 4[dd] necrotic damage. Necrotic bolts can detonate primed targets.
data.adv_option_2: Growing Storm: While the spell is maintained, the storm's radius grows by 2m at the start of your turn.
adv_options: Necrotic Bolts: Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on each of your turns to cause a bolt of necrotic energy to leap from the center of the sphere toward one creature you choose within 20m of the center. Make a ranged spell attack. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is in the sphere. On a hit, the target takes 4d10 necrotic damage. Necrotic bolts can detonate primed targets.
Growing Storm: While the spell is maintained, the storm's radius grows by 2m at the start of your turn.

data.name: Submission Net

mechanic.data: Spend 2 tech points to shoot a swarm of miniature pylons to a target location within 20m. The pylons form a 4m cylinder at the chosen location, created an electrified net. Creatures within the net cannot cast tech.
To escape, a creature must succeed on a Strength (Athletics) check or must remain trapped in the net. If a creature does break free, it takes 1d6 lightning damage.

If you have a submission net deployed, you can spend XTP to send electric currents through it. Each creature within the net makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes Xd6 lightning damage, or half as much on a successful one.

data.adv_option_1: Shock : You can electrify the net as a bonus action the first time you cast Submission net.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Grip : Increase the DC to break free of the net by 3.
adv_options: Shock : You can electrify the net as a bonus action the first time you cast Submission net.
Improved Grip : Increase the DC to break free of the net by 3.

data.name: Tactical Scan

mechanic.data: Spend your action scanning a creature you can see with your omni-tool, studying its movement and revealing weaknesses. Your attacks against the target have advantage and natural 19 and 20's are considered critical hits. This ability can stack with other critical improving powers.
You may use this ability three times before you finish a short or long rest.
Infiltrators may learn or advance this feature instead of gaining a tech power.

data.adv_option_1: Area Scan : Scan a 6m cube. You gain the advantage and critical bonus on all creatures within the area.
data.adv_option_2: Telegraphed Attacks : You're HUD alerts you when the creature is about to attack. It has disadvantage on ranged and melee attacks and you have advantage on any saving throws caused by spells and abilities of the creature.
adv_options: Area Scan : Scan a 6m cube. You gain the advantage and critical bonus on all creatures within the area.

Telegraphed Attacks : You're HUD alerts you when the creature is about to attack. It has disadvantage on ranged and melee attacks and you have advantage on any saving throws caused by spells and abilities of the creature.

data.name: Target Painting

mechanic.data: Spend 2 tech points to paint an 8m cube within range. Any creature in the area when the spell is cast is highlighted on all friendly creatures HUDs if it fails a Dexterity saving throw.
Any attack roll against an affected creature or object has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature or object can't benefit from being invisible.

data.adv_option_1: Heavy Weapon Sync : Information about the painted targets sync with heavy weapon systems. Any creature that would make a saving throw to avoid heavy weapon damage has disadvantage on the saving throw.
data.adv_option_2: Efficient Scan : Target Painting only cost 1 tech point and has paints a 10m cube.
adv_options: Heavy Weapon Sync : Information about the painted targets sync with heavy weapon systems. Any creature that would make a saving throw to avoid heavy weapon damage has disadvantage on the saving throw.
Efficient Scan : Target Painting only cost 1 tech point and has paints a 10m cube.

data.name: Throw

mechanic.data: Make a ranged spell attack on a target you can see within range. On a hit, hurl the target backwards 10m and deal force damage equal to 1d6 + your biotic modifier.
At higher levels: This spell's damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), 17th level (4d6)

data.adv_option_1: Improved Force : Throw is so forceful, it lifts the target off the ground when knocking it back. Targets must pass a Dexterity saving throw or are knocked prone.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d8
adv_options: Improved Force : Throw is so forceful, it lifts the target off the ground when knocking it back. Targets must pass a Dexterity saving throw or are knocked prone.
Improved Damage : Increase the damage die type to d8

data.name: Turbocharge

mechanic.data: Insert a specialized thermal clip that connects to your armor’s kinetic barrier. The weapon's rate of fire is increased by 2. The weapon no longer needs to be reloaded; instead, each ranged weapon attack reduces your shield points by an amount equal to the weapon's rate of fire. While turbocharge is active, you move at half your speed (rounded down) and you have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws. You can use an action to cancel Turbocharge, removing the thermal clip and reloading your weapon; otherwise, it lasts until your shield points are reduced to 0. You must finish a long rest before you can use this ability again.

data.adv_option_1: Quick Charge : You can activate and deactivate Turbocharge as a bonus action.
data.adv_option_2: Improved Charge : Increase your weapon's rate of fire by 4.
adv_options: Quick Charge : You can activate and deactivate Turbocharge as a bonus action.
Improved Charge : Increase your weapon's rate of fire by 4.

data.name: Unity

mechanic.data: You spend X tech points and tap into the medical interface of a fallen comrade. You revive a friendly creature that has gone unconscious or died within the last minute. That creature returns to consciousness or life with hit points equal to Xd4 + your proficiency bonus.

data.adv_option_1: Unrestricted : There is no limit to the amount of TP you may spend on this ability.
data.adv_option_2: Quick : You can use Unity as a reaction to the creature falling unconscious or dying.
adv_options: Unrestricted : There is no limit to the amount of TP you may spend on this ability.
Quick : You can use Unity as a reaction to the creature falling unconscious or dying.

data.name: Vortex

mechanic.data: You intertwine negative and positive mass effect fields to create a swirling vortex. Creatures within a 10m cone must make a DEX saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 4d10 bludgeoning damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Creatures that fail the saving throw are thrown 1d6 + 2m away from you and become {prone}.
At Higher Levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, increase the damage by 1d10 for each slot level above the 3rd.

data.adv_option_1: Radial : You may cast the vortex in a 6m radius sphere instead.
data.adv_option_2: Damage : Increase the damage to d12
adv_options: Radial : You may cast the vortex in a 6m radius sphere instead.
Damage : Increase the damage to d12

data.name: Warp

mechanic.data: Make a ranged spell attack on an organic creature you can see within range. On a hit, you generate a rapidly shifting mass effect field inside the target dealing necrotic damage equal to 3d10 + your biotic modifier. In addition, the target is {primed-necrotic} until the end of its next turn. This damage bypasses shields.
At higher levels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of level 3 or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above the 2nd.

data.adv_option_1: Internal Bleeding : The shifting causes internal bleeding. At the start of your turn, the target takes 1[dd] necrotic damage bypassing its shields until it uses medi-gel or is stabilized.
data.adv_option_2: Keel over : A target hit by warp must pass a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the force of warp is so intense the target is knocked {prone} and {stunned} until the start of your next turn.
adv_options: Internal Bleeding : The shifting causes internal bleeding. At the start of your turn, the target takes 1d10 necrotic damage bypassing its shields until it uses medi-gel or is stabilized.

Keel over : A target hit by warp must pass a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the force of warp is so intense the target is knocked {prone} and {stunned} until the start of your next turn.

data.name: Biotic Push

mechanic.data: Make a melee spell attack on a medium-size or smaller object within range. On a hit, you create a pocket mass effect field that deals 1d4 force damage repels the target 6m away from you, knocking it {prone}.
At higher levels: This spell's damage increases by 1d4 when you reach 5th level (2d4), 11th level (3d4), 17th level (4d4)

data.adv_option_1: Quick Cast : You may cast Biotic Push as a bonus action.
data.adv_option_2: Deadly Push : The force of the blast causes internal bleeding, dealing and additional 1d6 necrotic damage.
adv_options: Quick Cast : You may cast Biotic Push as a bonus action.
Deadly Push : The force of the blast causes internal bleeding, dealing and additional 1d6 necrotic damage.

data.name: Biotic Punch

mechanic.data: Make a melee spell attack on an object within range. On a hit, you increase the mass of your fist, 1d8 bludgeoning damage. The kinetic force can be harness by your biotic implant as Barrier ticks. Gain 1 barrier tick per size of the object that was hit (1 for small, 2 for medium, 3 for large, etc.)
At higher levels: This spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), 17th level (4d8)

data.adv_option_1: Efficient Punch : Gain an additional barrier tick when you hit a target with your Biotic punch
data.adv_option_2: Syphoning Strike : Instead of gaining a barrier tick, you can regain 2 shield points per size of the creature.
adv_options: Efficient Punch : Gain an additional barrier tick when you hit a target with your Biotic punch
Syphoning Strike : Instead of gaining a barrier tick, you can regain 2 shield points per size of the creature.
